t: Revelation 2
Message to Ephesus

“To*rp the*r angel*r of*r the*r church*r in*r Ephesus*r write:*r The*brp One*r who*r holds*r the*r seven*r stars*r in*r His*r right*r hand,*r the*r One*r who*r walks*r among*r the*r seven*r golden*r lampstands,*r says*r this:*r

‘I*rp know*r your*r deeds*r and*r your*r toil*r and*r perseverance,*r and*r that*r you*r cannot*r tolerate*r evil*r men,*r and*r you*r put*r to*r the*r test*r those*r who*r call*r themselves*r apostles,*r and*r they*r are*r not,*r and*r you*r found*r them*r to*ir be*ir false;*r
and*r you*r have*r perseverance*r and*r have*r endured*r for*r My*r name’s*r sake,*r and*r have*r not*r grown*r weary.*r
But*r I*r have*r this*ir against*r you,*r that*r you*r have*r left*r your*r first*r love.*r

‘I*rp know*r your*r deeds,*r and*r your*r love*r and*r faith*r and*r service*r and*r perseverance,*r and*r that*r your*r deeds*r of*r late*r are*r greater*r than*r at*r first.*r
